inputs.description: Set the anat parent dataset to 'aset'.  This is a nonoptional option (must be present).
inputs.name: APAR

inputs.description: Set the data parent dataset to 'dset'.  This is a nonoptional option (must be present). Note: dset may contain a sub-brick selector, e.g.,  -dpar 'dset+orig[2,5,7]'
inputs.name: DPAR

inputs.description: Set the prefix for the output dataset to 'ppp'. The default is the prefix of 'dset'.
inputs.name: PREFIX

inputs.description: Set the grid spacing in the output datset to 'ddd' mm.  The default is 1 mm.
inputs.name: DXYZ

inputs.description: Write out result even if it means deleting an existing dataset.  The default is not to overwrite.
inputs.name: FORCE

inputs.description: Set resampling mode to 'rrr' for all sub-bricks --- OR ---
inputs.name: RESAM

inputs.description: Set resampling mode to 'rrr' for threshold sub-bricks
inputs.name: THR

inputs.description: Set resampling mode to 'rrr' for functional sub-bricks  The resampling mode 'rrr' must be one of the following: NN = Nearest Neighbor Li = Linear Interpolation Cu = Cubic Interpolation Bk = Blocky Interpolation  NOTE:  The default resampling mode is Li for all sub-bricks.  ++ Compile date = Sep  7 2018 {:}
inputs.name: FUNC
